summary: Counterfeit goods harm the U.S. economy and can pose a threat to consumers. But these products can be hard to spot and may be offered online next to authentic goods. For example, we testified that manufacturers determined that 20 of 47 items we purchased from third-party sellers on popular sites were counterfeit. Customs and Border Protection leads efforts to stop imported counterfeit goods at the...
title: Intellectual Property: CBP Can Enhance Information Sharing with the Private Sector to Address Changes in the Counterfeits Market
